com.github.sanity4j.ant.taskdef

Class RunQA.Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.sanity4j.ant.taskdef.RunQA.Configuration
  • Enclosing class:
    RunQA

    public static class RunQA.Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
    An ant type that stores a tool name / tool version / and the 'location' of a configuration file for the given tool.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Configuration(org.apache.tools.ant.Project project)
      Creates a RunQA.Configuration associated with the given ANT Project.
